title: Dual mechanism with graded energy storage in long-term aqueous zinc-ion batteries achieved using a polymer/vanadium dioxide cathode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6666-6675
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02557A, Paper
Zhihang Song, Yi Zhao, Huirong Wang, Anbin Zhou, Xiaoyu Jin, Yongxin Huang, Li Li, Feng Wu, Renjie Chen
The functional groups on NDA can fix the iodine produced in the oxidation process, forming a graded energy storage structure.
